channel.title: Table for Onde + friends
channel.description: The team from [https://www.la-voix-du-luthier.com](https://www.la-voix-du-luthier.com) was kind enough to send me the ONDE, here is two Axoloti+MTM Axocontrol playing thru ONDE https://youtu.be/m1AOfItwJs4

item.title: Table for Onde + friends
item.dc:creator: @keyman Antonio Machado
item.description:
@keyman wrote:

Sorry for late reply...

Abhoth:

Do you like it?

Yes! I really do!
ONDE “ticks many boxes” bridging the gap between electronic and acoustic, even lifeless “controllers” and musician/performer, adding “color”, uniqueness to sound. Things for me that stand out: aesthetics, use of wood, sound dispersion (omnidirectional) the word immersive is really suited; solutions of mounting points/setups: front/back soundboards volume knob: and into features= loooong lasting batteries/Bluetooth aptx

Abhoth:

have you tried it with the Eigenharp?

Nop, time does not stretch... but thinking of it, Cello and Clarinet are physical models /convolution, let’s see if I can record something before returning the ONDE and feeling blue with its absenss.

Congrats on choosing the Onde+ContinuuMini

Read full topic

item.title: Table for Onde + friends
item.dc:creator: @Abhoth Kai Drange
item.description:
@Abhoth wrote:

I kickstarted the Onde + Continuumini. Really nice video (as always!) Do you like it? have you tried it with the Eigenharp?
